about_the_game:
Ever wondered what it is like, to live the life of a wild animal? Travel through the wilds as one of many lovingly recreated animals in Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe!
This game is the perfect RPG Sandbox for playing as a modern-day animal! Journey into the stylized world of Larkonia at the dawn of the modern age.

Hunt, Chase, and Eat your prey as a predator!

Forage for food and Fly across the skies as a bird!

Make your own rules!

The Wild is Waiting!

Features:
Casual growth system with male, female, and juvenile characters.
Low-poly art style.
Basic combat system.
Private matches with the ability to invite friends!
Ability to play as one of many animal species from Europe (with more added over the game's development cycle).
Active support on the forums.
Suitable for most ages (blood and gore appears in the form of a half-eaten ribcage, but it is stylized to be less gruesome).
Spectator cam and Cinematic mode for filming videos.*

This game is a passion project made by one developer out of a love for all things related to wildlife and animals.



*Game does not include recording software or video editing tools.
detailed_description:
Made by a gamer, for gamers!


Hello! I am Jacob Larkin, a gamer with a passion for all things wildlife! With my games, you can expect quality content that gets lots of TLC and thought poured into it. Every project I make is made with the mindset that it needs to be as close to the natural world as possible without sacrificing fun-factor. Above all else, games should be fun for all! I hope you enjoy!


About the Game

Ever wondered what it is like, to live the life of a wild animal? Travel through the wilds as one of many lovingly recreated animals in Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe!
This game is the perfect RPG Sandbox for playing as a modern-day animal! Journey into the stylized world of Larkonia at the dawn of the modern age.

Hunt, Chase, and Eat your prey as a predator!

Forage for food and Fly across the skies as a bird!

Make your own rules!

The Wild is Waiting!

Features:
Casual growth system with male, female, and juvenile characters.
Low-poly art style.
Basic combat system.
Private matches with the ability to invite friends!
Ability to play as one of many animal species from Europe (with more added over the game's development cycle).
Active support on the forums.
Suitable for most ages (blood and gore appears in the form of a half-eaten ribcage, but it is stylized to be less gruesome).
Spectator cam and Cinematic mode for filming videos.*

This game is a passion project made by one developer out of a love for all things related to wildlife and animals.



*Game does not include recording software or video editing tools.

name: Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4-Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon (TM) RX 460 Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: 8-Core or 16-Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon (TM) RX 570 Graphics or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe! Survive and Thrive as one of many lovingly recreated European species.
